
### life homework even/odd  {.smaller}

naive way has an operation that needs locking: 
<pre><code>for (int time = 0; time &lt; MAX_ITERATIONS; ++time) {
    ... compute to_grid ...
    <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">swap(from_grid, to_grid);</span>
}
</code></pre>
 but this alternative needs less locking: 
<pre><code>Grid grids\[2];
for (int time = 0; time &lt; MAX_ITERATIONS; ++time) {
    from_grid = &amp;grids\[time % 2];
    to_grid = &amp;grids\[(time % 2) + 1];
    ... compute to_grid ...
}
</code></pre>
